title: Ep. 4: 'The Watch'
description:
On today's episode of 'The Watch," Chris and Andy chat about the new 'Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice' trailer, the upcoming 'The People vs. OJ Simpson' (8:00) series, 'Fargo' (11:00), and whether network's still need hits (31:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
